definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Hey, Sue. Have you got any pain-killers at hand? I have a splitting headache.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，蘇。你有止疼片嗎？我頭痛的快裂開了。

sentences.english: Before we make love my husband takes a pain killer.
sentences.chinese: 在我們發生關係之前，我丈夫吃了止疼片。

sentences.english: I'll prescribe some pain—killer . Take one when you feel really bad.
sentences.chinese: 我給你開點止疼片，頭疼的厲害時喫一片。

sentences.english: In order to relieve your pain, I advise you to take some painkillers.
sentences.chinese: 爲了減輕你的疼痛，我建議你服下一些止疼片。

definition: voltaren, a trade name for diclofenac sodium, a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to reduce swelling and as painkiller
antipyretic tablet (to reduce fever), such as sulfanilamide
Ibuprofen or Nurofen/also called 異丁苯丙酸|异丁苯丙酸
to put sb on an intravenous drip
